original_title: 나는 원래 대전에서 로맨틱 코미디를 찍으려고 했었다
overview: Director Byeon from Daejon barely makes a living by teaching about scenarios. Then one day, Byeon hears that one of his short films has been chosen for the Short Film Corner at the Cannes Film Festival. However, unexpected things happen around Byeon, before he finally goes to France and meets Sara, a mysterious actress.
title: Daejeon Romantic Comedy
